


## Purpose
This web app can estimate the price of your property and can help you in getting a fair price.It has been specifially built for San francisco.


## Usage
Ths app requires 4 kinds ofinput from the user: age of the property, number of bedrooms, carpet area in square feet and the lot size.

Using these 4 inputs, the app predicts the price of the house. The model used for prediction has been trained on the san-francisco home sales data in the nutella package in R. The model chosen is a linear regression model.
